businesscraft.path_instructions: Click on a block to set the path start point
businesscraft.path_end_instructions: Click on a block to set the path end point
businesscraft.no_platforms: No platforms available. Click 'Add Platform' to create one.
businesscraft.delete_platform: Delete this platform (only available for the last platform)
businesscraft.set_platform_path_instruct: Right-click a block to set the start point, then right-click another block to set the end point. Press ESC to cancel.
businesscraft.platform_path_instructions: Platform Path Mode: Right-click to set START position, then right-click to set END position. Press ESC to cancel.
businesscraft.platform_path_start_set: Platform start point set at [%s, %s, %s]! Now click to set the end point.
businesscraft.platform_path_end_set: Platform end point set at [%s, %s, %s]! Path created successfully.
businesscraft.platform_path_reset: Platform path reset. You'll need to set a new path.
businesscraft.no_destinations: No other towns available as destinations
businesscraft.default_destination_info: If no destinations are enabled, tourists will go to any town
